meaning: to have the upper hand, to be in an advantageous position

examples.chinese: 這麼說起來，到底是誰比較佔上風 ？
examples.translation: Speaking of which, who exactly has the upper hand?

examples.chinese: 我朋友是那種一定要佔上風的人！
examples.translation: My friend is the type who always needs to have the upper hand!

examples.chinese: 別試圖去挽回他,這樣只會讓他佔上風
examples.translation: Don't try to win him back, that will only give him the upper hand.

sourceEnglish: have an advantage, be better positioned
